summary: AN ORDINANCE establishing the Comprehensive Residential Weatherization Program; establishing certain standard energy conservation measures; establishing positions for the administration of the Comprehensive Residential Weatherization Program, increasing and decreasing certain objects of expenditure in the 1981 Budgets of various City departments, offices, and agencies, by appropriation from the Light Fund, and by reduction, reappropriations and transfer; authorizing the acceptance of an Urban Development Action Grant and appropriating and authorizing its expenditure.
